name: barracuda-reputation-block-list
label: Baracudda Reputation Block List
description: Barracuda Reputation System is a real-time database of IP addresses that have a poor reputation for sending valid emails. Barracuda Central maintains and manually verifies all IP addresses marked as "poor" on the Barracuda Reputation System.

fields.name: dnsServerIP
fields.description: Specify the DNS Server IP Address

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Uploads a IP to Barracuda Reputation System and retrieves the analysis results.

parameters.title: Lookup IPv4 Or IPv6
parameters.name: iplookup
parameters.description: Specify the IP for which you want to retrieve the reputation information.
